name: SENRAN KAGURA Reflexions - Glorious Reflexology (Set of Three)
detailed_description:
Glorious Reflexology Set of Three for SENRAN KAGURA Reflexions.

This downloadable content contains the following 3 gameplay modes:
・Glorious Reflexology "VIP Course"
A soothing upper body massage.

・Glorious Reflexology "Marvelous Course"
A unique suction massage.

・Glorious Reflexology "Paradise Course"
A heavenly foot rub.

content_descriptors.notes: SENRAN KAGURA Reflexions is a game starring female ninjas that contains partial nudity, sexual themes, some strong language, and descriptions of violence. Players massage the bodies of women in various states of undress using different tools, and, in one mode, players are able to freely touch the characters.
